Rules.DetailContent: Glichting into bases is a ban reason and will not be tolerated.
Glichting under the map or clipping thrue objects will not be tolerated.
Any kind of cheats or third-party programms are not allowed and will be treated accordingly.
Insults of all kinds will not be tolerated unless they are part of an roleplay.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut et mi non purus varius maximus. Pellentesque interdum, justo id luctus euismod, urna sapien convallis justo, non feugiat sapien orci a leo. Mauris lobortis sapien in erat interdum pretium. Integer ultrices odio lobortis lectus gravida, ac congue velit consequat. Nullam tempor lectus mollis, vulputate nibh sed, interdum ante.
